verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] standing by the controversial immigration policy of separating families at the U.S. border .
[ARG1: The Trump administration] is [V: standing] [ARG2: by the controversial immigration policy of separating families at the U.S. border] .
The Trump administration is standing by the controversial immigration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: families] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S. border] .
